data.text:
A day off. While wandering around the shopping 
district, I suddenly smelled something nice. A 
sweets shop. Seems like it's freshly baked cookies.

choices.text: The color is nice and it looks good!

data.processed:
󠁿A day off. While wandering around the shopping 
󠁿district, I suddenly smelled something nice. A

data.text:
Thanks! Well~, this morning's batch turned out well! 
It might be twice as crisp as usual!
data.name: Sweets Store Clerk
data.processed:
󠁿Thanks! Well~, this morning's batch turned out well! 
󠁿It might be twice as crisp as usual!

data.text:
Smiles just came naturally when you came across something good. 
That's all it took for the world to seem brighter.
data.processed:
󠁿Smiles just came naturally when you came across something good. 
󠁿That's all it took for the world to seem brighter.

data.text:
It was refreshing, a comfortable feeling. 
If she was here, I'm sure she'd say――
data.processed:
󠁿It was refreshing, a comfortable feeling. 
󠁿If she was here, I'm sure she'd say――

data.text: Mmmm~, Marvelous☆ It smells good!

data.text: Ohー, huh, it's Trainer!!
data.name: Marvelous Sunday
data.processed: 󠁿Ohー, huh, it's Trainer!!

data.text:
After eating 2 servings of cookies, 
we walked around the shopping district.
data.processed:
󠁿After eating 2 servings of cookies, 
󠁿we walked around the shopping district.

data.text:
Those cookies! They were very Marvelous, weren't they?☆ 
I met up with Trainer so today's already been Marvelous★
data.name: Marvelous Sunday
data.processed:
󠁿Those cookies! They were very Marvelous, weren't they?☆ 
󠁿I met up with Trainer so today's already been Marvelous★

data.text:
That's right! Trainer, let's go search for Marvelous together! 
We'll go search the world for a new Marvelous☆★☆
data.name: Marvelous Sunday
data.processed:
󠁿That's right! Trainer, let's go search for Marvelous together! 
󠁿We'll go search the world for a new Marvelous☆★☆

data.text:
Searching for Marvelous, huh. It sounds interesting. 
That brilliant world that she sees――I want to get 
a feel for that "Marvelous" world.

choices.text: I'll take you up on that offer

data.processed:
󠁿Searching for Marvelous, huh. It sounds interesting.

data.text:
Alrightーー! 
Rather than being alone, being together is more Marvelous☆
data.name: Marvelous Sunday
data.processed:
󠁿Alrightーー! 
󠁿Rather than being alone, being together is more Marvelous☆

data.text: Ooh~! Look at the bonsai in that garden~☆
data.name: Marvelous Sunday
data.processed: 󠁿Ooh~! Look at the bonsai in that garden~☆

data.text:
There was a wonderful bonsai in the garden. 
While seeking Marvelous, I ended up staring at the bonsai――
data.processed:
󠁿There was a wonderful bonsai in the garden. 
󠁿While seeking Marvelous, I ended up staring at the bonsai――

data.text: What are you doing, do you have some business with me?
data.name: Old Man A
data.processed: 󠁿What are you doing, do you have some business with me?

data.text:
Yeah! I was just thinking this bonsai is Marvelous☆ 
Especially the shape of the trunk, it's very Marvelous★
data.name: Marvelous Sunday
data.processed:
󠁿Yeah! I was just thinking this bonsai is Marvelous☆ 
󠁿Especially the shape of the trunk, it's very Marvelous★

data.text:
The old man's expression became serious. This could be bad. 
I was going to apologize for peeking in without permission but――
data.processed:
󠁿The old man's expression became serious. This could be bad. 
󠁿I was going to apologize for peeking in without permission but――

data.text: Girly, you really do get it, huh……!
data.name: Old Man A
data.processed: 󠁿Girly, you really do get it, huh……!

data.text:
It's all about that trunk! It took 20 years to get like that! 
I used a wire to arrange it in to that shape.
data.name: Old Man A

choices.text: 20 years! That's alot of time and effort!

Yeah, yeah! That's really Marvelous☆ 
You've been taking really good care of it, huh!?

󠁿Yeah, yeah! That's really Marvelous☆ 
󠁿You've been taking really good care of it, huh!?

I'll bet that bonsai grew so beautifully

data.name: Marvelous Sunday

󠁿in response to your feelings!

data.text:
So, that makes this a miraculous Marvelous☆ Seeing something

data.processed:
󠁿So, that makes this a miraculous Marvelous☆ Seeing something

Aaah…… it's been a while since I've felt like this……

󠁿Aaah…… it's been a while since I've felt like this……

󠁿The old man spoke so happily. No matter who she talked to,

data.text:
We headed to the park to take a break. Marvelous Sunday spotted 
a girl sitting alone and immediately went over to her.
data.processed:

No…… I……just moved here, 
so I haven't made any friends yet……
